message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money. This offer won't last forever.
You're right, time is money. But I'm not getting less patient.
Time is valuable to both of us, Alice. Let's find a middle ground. This is my final offer.
Middle ground is one thing, but I'm the one with the upper hand here.
Alice, I'm serious about getting this done. This offer is more than fair considering the time pressure. Don't let this opportunity slip away.
I'm not feeling the pressure, Bob. You are.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.  Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not.
Alice, this is absurd.  I'm giving you the majority to end this pointless back and forth. Don't be greedy.
You're right, it's absurd. Absurd that you think I'd settle for less.
